sources.full: Darkest Dungeon - Horrors of the Dark

trait.name: Shank (1/Turn)
entries: The cutthroat deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon Attack and has advantage on the Attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the cutthroat that isn't Incapacitated and the cutthroat doesn't have disadvantage on the Attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cutthroat makes 2 attacks with their daggers, the second one is made with disadvantage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Musket
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Blanket Fire
entries: The fusilier fires a buckshot in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Pistoliero
entries: When using a pistol, the Bloodletter has no disadvantage on ranged attacks when a hostile creature is within 5 feet of them.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Bloodletter makes 2 Cat O' Nine Tails attacks.

action.name: Cat O' Nine Tails
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Flintlock Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage. This attack deals 3 ({@damage 1d6}) additional damage if the target is within 5 feet of the Bloodletter.

action.name: Punishment {@recharge 4}
entries: The Bloodletter unleashes a barrage of wild whip lashes. Each creature of the Bloodletter's choice in a 15-foot cube originating from the Bloodletter must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) slashing damage and can't take reactions until the beginning of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and can still use reactions.

trait.name: Surprise Opening
entries: In the first round of combat, the Cutthroat's first attack against any surprised creature has advantage.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: The outlaw cutthroat deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the outlaw cutthroat that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the outlaw cutthroat doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Cutthroat makes 2 weapon attacks, one with their shortsword and one with their dagger.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Skirmish
entries: The Fusilier can take the disengage action as a bonus action on each of their turns.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Musket
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) damage.

action.name: Blanket Fire
entries: The Fusilier fires a buckshot in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage, cannot use reactions and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the Fusilier's next turn. On a successful save a creature takes half as much damage.

trait.name: Pistoliero
entries: When using a pistol, the Bloodletter has no disadvantage on ranged attacks when a hostile creature is within 5 feet of them.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Bloodletter makes 2 weapon attacks, only one of them can be a Flintlock Pistol attack.

action.name: Cat O' Nine Tails
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage. If this attack hits a creature a second time in a turn, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or becomes {@condition frightened} until the beginning of the Bloodletter's next turn.

entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) damage. This attack deals 3 ({@damage 1d6}) additional damage if the target is within 5 feet of the Bloodletter.

entries: The Bloodletter unleashes a barrage of wild whip lashes. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and can still use reactions.

entries: Once per turn, the infamous cutthroat deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the infamous cutthroat that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the infamous cutthroat doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: The infamous fusilier can take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Fusilier makes 2 weapon attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Musket.
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Blanket Fire.
entries: The Fusilier fires a buckshot in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) piercing damage, cannot use bonus actions and reactions, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the Fusilier's next turn. A creature that fails its saving throw by 5 or more has its speed reduced to 0 instead. On a successful save a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the infamous bloodletter hits with it.

If this attack hits a creature a second time in a turn, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or becomes {@condition frightened} until the end of the Bloodletter's next turn.

action.name: Flintlock Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage. This attack deals 7 ({@damage 2d6}) additional damage if the target is within 5 feet of the Bloodletter.

action.name: Punishment {@recharge 4}
entries: The Bloodletter unleashes a barrage of wild whip lashes. Each creature of the Bloodletter's choice in a 15-foot cube originating from the Bloodletter must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 15 ({@damage 6d4}) slashing damage and can't take reactions until the beginning of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and can still use reactions.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The brigand raider has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the brigand raider's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: No Mercy (1/turn)
entries: Once per turn, the brigand raider can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to a creature they hit with a weapon attack and has advantage on the Attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Brigand Raider makes 3 weapon attacks, 2 with their long sword and one with their short sword.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The brigand hunter has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the brigand hunter's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Brigand Hunter makes 2 weapon attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Flintlock Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Blanket Fire
entries: The Hunter fires a buckshot in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) piercing damage, cannot use bonus actions and reactions, and its speed is reduced by 0 feet until the start of the Hunter's next turn. On a successful save a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

reaction.name: Skirmish
entries: When a hostile creature ends its turn within 5 ft. of the Brigand Hunter, they can move up to half of their speed. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Bomb Supply
entries: When Vvulf the Brigand is within 5 feet of his bomb barrel, he can use an action to recharge his Bomb action.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the vvulf the brigand hits with it.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Vvulf the brigand fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Tower Shield
entries: Vvulf carries a large Tower Shield. If Vvulf, one of his allies, or his barrel of bombs, is subjected to an effect which allows him to make a Dexterity save for half damage, he can use a reaction to take no damage. Alternatively Vvulf can use a reaction to impose disadvantage on an attack targeting an ally or his barrel bomb. To do so, Vvulf must see the effect or attack and be wielding his Tower Shield.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Vvulf the Brigand makes 2 weapon attacks. Vvulf can replace one weapon attacks with a Warcry.

action.name: Tower Shield Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a medium or smaller sized creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or is pushed 5 ft. away from Vvulf.

action.name: Warcry
entries: Vvulf unleashes a howling warcry to intimidate his foes. Every hostile creature, that can hear Vvulf, within 20 ft. of him must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become intimidated for 1 minute. When an intimidated creature makes an ability check or attack roll, it must roll a {@dice 1d6} and subtract the number rolled from the ability check or attack roll. An intimidated creature can repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that is immune to being {@condition frightened} succeeds on the save automatically. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Vvulf's Warcry for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Bomb (Recharge 5-6).
entries: Vvulf throws a Bomb at a point within 40 feet of him. At the end of his turn, it explodes in a 10 foot radius. Each creature in the blast must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) fire damage on a failed save and half as much on a successful one.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Brigand Vvulf moves up to half of his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Warcry
entries: Brigand Vvulf unleashes a warcry.

legendary.name: "Get Them!" (1/Round)
entries: A Brigand Raider or Hunter within 40 ft. of Vvulf, who can hear him, uses a reaction to move up to half of their speed and make an attack against a creature in range.

legendary.name: Attack (2 Actions)
entries: Vvulf makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Resupply (2 Actions)
entries: If Vvulf is within 5 feet of his bomb barrel, he recharges his Bomb action.

trait.name: Disease Carrier
entries: A maggot has a 25% chance of carrying a disease determined by the Dungeon Master.

trait.name: Crawling Movement
entries: The maggot's movement is not impeded by difficult terrain.

action.name: Nibble
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or is {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Disease Carrier
entries: A carrion eater has a 25% chance of carrying a disease determined by the Dungeon Master.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The carrion eater has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The carrion eater can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage.

trait.name: Devour
entries: The large carrion eater has advantage on all attacks against a creature it has {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The large carrion eater makes 2 attacks, one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. The target is {@condition grappled}, escape {@dc 13}, and until the grapple ends the large carrion eater can't attack another target with its tentacles.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) extra damage if the attack was made with advantage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The webber can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the webber knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The webber ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage, plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Web {@recharge 4}
entries: The Webber fires a web at a creature within 40 ft. of itself. The target must succeed on a {@dc 11} dexterity saving throw or is {@condition restrained} by webs. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 11} Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The rabid gnasher has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Hit and Run
entries: When the gnasher makes an attack against a creature, it does not provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of the turn, whether it hits or not.

action.name: Venomous Gleek
entries: The pliskin spits deadly poison at a creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Warning Rattle
entries: The rattler begins to rattle its tail and takes a defensive stance until the beginning of its next turn. While the Rattler is in this stance, any enemy creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the rattler or enters the area for the first time during its turn, must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure a creature has disadvantage on any attack rolls that do not target the rattler until the end of the rattler's next turn. Creatures that can't see and hear the rattler, or that are immune to being {@condition frightened} are not affected.

reaction.name: Lashing Bite
entries: When an enemy creature within 5 feet of the rattler makes an attack while the rattler rattles its tail, the rattler makes a bite attack against that creature. To do this the rattler must see the enemy.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The adder has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Quills
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or is {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Adder's Fang
entries: The adder fires a poison loaded dart at a creature within 60 feet of itself that it can see. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or is hit by the poison dart and suffers 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage. The creature takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage at the beginning of each of its turns for one minute or until a creature spends an action to remove the dart from its body.

action.name: Molt (1/Long Rest)
entries: The adder sheds its skin and regains 9 ({@dice 2d8}) hit points. It also ends any lasting effect or condition of non-magical origin that is affecting the Adder, such as Alchemist's Fire or poison.

trait.name: Swarm.
entries: The maggot swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Web (1/Short Rest)
entries: The Webber shoots a 15 ft square sticky web at a point within 30 ft. of itself. The web is difficult terrain and thinly covers the ground. Each creature that starts its turn in the web or enters it during its turn must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or becomes {@condition restrained} as long as it remains in the web or until it breaks free. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 12} Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage). The web remains for an hour.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}20 ({@damage 8d4}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or is {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, the {@condition poisoned} target is {@condition stunned}.

action.name: Nibbles (Swarm has Less Than Half HP)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or is {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, the {@condition poisoned} target is {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The flesh eater has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The flesh eater can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Virulent Host
entries: A flesh eater carries many horrific diseases. When the Flesh eater hits and inflicts damage on a creature with its bite, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or is {@condition poisoned}, as if afflicted by the Contagion spell. Once a creature made made its saving throw, regardless of success or failure, it becomes immune to this effect for 24 hours.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 6d6 + 3}) piercing damage, plus 10 ({@damage 4d4}) poison damage.

entries: The large flesh eater has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The large flesh eater can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Devour
entries: The large flesh eater has advantage on all attacks against a creature it has {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The large flesh eater makes 3 attacks, two with its tentacles and one with its bite. If both tentacles attacks hit the same target, it is {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage. The target is {@condition grappled}, escape {@dc 15}, and until the grapple ends the large flesh eater can't attack another target with its tentacles.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) extra damage if the attack was made with advantage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The ancient webber can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the ancient webber knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The ancient webber ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The webber makes 2 attacks with its bite or its web shot.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Web Shot
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}If the target is a large or smaller creature, it is {@condition restrained} by webs until the end of the Webber's next turn. The target or a creature within 5 ft. of it can spend an action to remove the webs.

action.name: Web (1/Short Rest)
entries: The Webber shoots a 15 ft square sticky web at a point within 30 ft. of itself. The web is difficult terrain and thinly covers the ground. Each creature that starts its turn in the web or enters it during its turn must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or becomes {@condition restrained} as long as it remains in the web or until it breaks free. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 12} Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage). The web remains for an hour.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The ancient spitter can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the ancient spitter knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The ancient spitter ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

trait.name: Takedown.
entries: Takedown. The first time in a turn the spitter hits a creature with an attack it made with advantage, it deals an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spitter makes 2 attacks with its bite or spit.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) piercing damage, plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Spit Venom
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Hit and Run
entries: When the gnasher makes an attack against a creature, it does not provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of the turn, whether it hits or not.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The harrying gnasher has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Rabid Rush
entries: Before attacking, the Harrying Gnasher can choose to make its attacks with advantage. If it does, it scores critical hits on a roll of 19 or 20 and attacks against it have advantage until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gnasher makes 2 bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Lethal Poison
entries: The Pliskin's doubles its proficiency bonus for its poison DC (included in the attacks).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage, plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage. damage. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save the creature takes the poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the end of the pliskin's next turn. On a successful save a creature takes half as much damage and is not {@condition poisoned}. A creature {@condition poisoned} this way takes 14 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage at the end of its turn.

action.name: Venomous Gleek
entries: The pliskin spits deadly poison at a creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Combat Reflexes
entries: The rattler has an additional reaction per round that it can only use for its Lashing Bite reaction.

trait.name: Coil
entries: As long as the rattler takes its defensive stance and rattles its tail, ranged attacks against it are made with disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Enraged Rattler makes a bite attack and uses its Warning Rattle.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Warning Rattle
entries: The rattler begins to rattle its tail and takes a defensive stance until the beginning of its next turn. While the Rattler is in this stance, any enemy creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the rattler or enters the area for the first time during its turn, must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure a creature has disadvantage on any attack rolls that do not target the rattler until the end of the rattler's next turn. A creature that fails the saving throw by more than 5 is {@condition frightened} of the Rattler until the end of its turn instead. Creatures that can't see and hear the Rattler, and that are immune to being frightend are not affected.

reaction.name: Lashing Bite
entries: When an enemy creature within 5 feet of the rattler makes an attack while the rattler rattles its tail, the rattler makes a bite attack against that creature. To do this the rattler must see the enemy.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The nightmarish adder has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Sinister Adder makes 2 bite attacks and one attack with its quills or uses its Adder's Fang.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Quills
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or is {@condition poisoned} until the end of the Sinister Adder's next turn. The {@condition poisoned} creature is {@condition paralyzed}.

action.name: Adder's Fang
entries: The adder fires a poison loaded dart at a creature within 60 feet of itself that it can see. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or is hit by the poison dart and suffers 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage. The creature takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) poison damage at the beginning of each of its turns for one minute or until a creature spends an action to remove the dart from its body.

action.name: Molt (1/Long Rest)
entries: The adder sheds its skin and regains 27 ({@dice 6d8}) hit points. It also ends any lasting effect or condition of non-magical origin that is affecting the Adder, such as Alchemist's Fire or poison.

trait.name: Dark Devotion

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cultist brawler makes 2 claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Doomsaying
entries: Any creature that ends its turn within 20 feet of the Madman and can hear it, must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or has disadvantage on all Wisdom saving throws until the beginning it's next turn.

headerEntries: The madman's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 11}). The madman can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Accusation
entries: A creature within 60 feet that can hear the Madman must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage and has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of the madman's next turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the sonorous prophet fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Rubble of Ruin
entries: Any creature that is under the effect of Calamitous Prognostication must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw at the beginning of the prophets turn, as calamity strikes. On a failed save, the target is hit by a falling object and takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) bludgeoning damage. After the creature made its saving throw, it is no longer under the effect of Calamitous Prognostication.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The prophet uses Calamitous Prognostication, he then makes a slam attack, fulminates, or uses Eyes on You.

entries: The prophet unleashes the foul vapours within his own decomposing body. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius centered on the prophet must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save the creature takes half as much damage and is not {@condition poisoned}.

entries: Any allied undead creature within 20 ft. of the bone bearer that can see it is immune to the charm and {@condition frightened} condition, as well as immune to effects that turn undead (including the bone bearer itself). Additionally each allied undead creature in the area deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage with each attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bone bearer makes two longsword attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage (see Unholy Banner).

action.name: Unholy Rally
entries: The bone bearer revives a corpse of an allied undead that died since the beginning of its last turn. That creature returns to life with all of its hit points.

reaction.name: Defend the Icon
entries: The bone bearer commands an allied undead creature within 20 ft. of the bone bearer to make a melee weapon attack against a creature that dealt damage to the bone bearer or its banner.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

trait.name: Clumsy Flight
entries: When the gargoyle ends its movement while being in the air, it falls. The gargoyle takes half damage from falling when it is able to use its wings.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the gargoyle brute remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a inanimate statue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gargoyle makes two attacks with its claws.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the creature is a Medium or smaller sized creature it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be either knocked {@condition prone} or pushed 5 ft. away from the gargoyle.

trait.name: Necrotic Feeding
entries: A ghoul can consume the body of a dead creature that is small size or larger to regain hit points. It takes the ghoul 1 minute to consume the entirety of the body but then regains 6 ({@dice 1d10 + 1}) hit points. The ghoul regains an additional 6 ({@dice 1d10 + 1}) hit points for each size category of the dead creature above small.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ghoul makes two attacks with its claws.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Cadaver Toss
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/40 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) damage.

action.name: Howl
entries: The ghoul unleashes a horrific howl. Each non-undead creature within 20 ft. of the ghoul that can hear it must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save a creature becomes {@condition frightened} of the ghoul for one minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the ghoul's howl for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Necromancer Apprentice

action.name: The Flesh Is Willing

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bayonette
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Necromancer
languages: All languages it spoke in life

trait.name: The Crawling Dead
entries: During the necromancer's turn it can use a bonus action to summon one bone veteran within 10 feet of itself, which lasts for one minute. The necromancer can have a maximum of 3 creatures summoned at a time.

headerEntries: The necromancer is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, +8 to hit with spell attacks). The necromancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: The Flesh is Willing
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shield Bash

reaction.name: Protective Strike

action.name: Bayonette
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Goblet Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bone royalty's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). The bone royalty can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components except for its Goblet.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tempting Goblet
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. The target must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the target has disadvantage on all attack and saving throws for one minute or until removed by the spell Remove Curse.

action.name: Spill Goblet
entries: The bone royalty spills the malific contents of its Goblet in a 10 foot radius centered on a point within 30 ft. of itself. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage and has disadvantage on all attacks and saving throws for one minute or until removed by the spell Remove Curse. As long as this attack has to recharge, the bone royalty is not able to use it as a spell component.

monster.name: Bone General
languages: Understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

trait.name: Pile of Bones
entries: When killed, the bone general's body becomes difficult terrain.

trait.name: Turn Defiance
entries: The bone general has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the bone general can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the bone general that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bone commander makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage. A creature hit by this attack twice in the same turn has disadvantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws until the end of the bone general's next turn.

action.name: Ground Pound {@recharge 5}
entries: The bone commander strikes the ground with all its might, causing a tremble in a 10 ft. radius centered on itself, or in a 15-foot-square originating from it. Each creature other than the bone commander must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. A creature that fails the saving throw by 5 or more is also {@condition stunned} until the end of the bone general's next turn.

trait.name: Impaling Thrust
entries: Once per turn when the bone lancer makes an attack with its war spear, its attack targets all creatures in a 15 foot long and 5 foot wide line originating from the Lancer. It makes a single attack roll against all of the creature's ACs.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bone lancer makes 3 attacks; two with its spear and one with its pommel.

action.name: War Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Pommel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

entries: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a inanimate statue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gargoyle makes two attacks with its claws.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the Gargoyle can choose to grapple the target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the creature is a Medium or smaller sized creature it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the gargoyle's next turn.

action.name: Flurry (1/Short Rest)
entries: The gargoyle makes three attacks; one with its tail and two with its claws.

trait.name: Necrotic Feeding
entries: A ghoul can consume the body of a dead creature that is small size or larger to regain hit points. It takes the ghoul 1 minute to consume the entirety of the body but then regains 6 ({@dice 1d10 + 1}) hit points. The ghoul regains an additional 6 ({@dice 1d10 + 1}) hit points for each size category of the dead creature above small.

trait.name: Unnerving Claws
entries: The first time in a turn a creature is hit by a the ghoul's claws, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or has disadvantage on all Wisdom saving throws until the end of the ghoul's next turn.

trait.name: Turn Defiance
entries: The ghoul has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ghoul makes three attacks; two with its claws and one with its bite. Instead of using its bite, the Ghoul can use its howl.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Cadaver Toss
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 20/40 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or is {@condition stunned} until the end of the ghouls next turn.

action.name: Howl
entries: The ghoul unleashes a horrific howl. Each non-undead creature within 20 ft. of the ghoul that can hear it must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save a creature becomes {@condition frightened} of the ghoul for one minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the ghoul's howl for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Feed
entries: The ghoul targets one creature with 0 hit points it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or dies and is consumed by the ghoul. After consuming a creature ghoul regains 26 ({@dice 4d10 + 4}) hit points.

languages: All languages it spoke in life

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the necromancer fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: The Crawling Dead
entries: During the necromancer's turn it can use a bonus action to summon one bone sergeant within 10 feet of itself, which lasts for one minute. The necromancer can have a maximum of 3 creatures summoned at a time.

headerEntries: The necromancer lord is a 15th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The necromancer lord has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: The Flesh is Willing
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) necrotic damage.

entries: An undead creature summoned by the necromancer lord moves up to its speed.

entries: The necromancer lord casts a cantrip.

entries: An undead summoned by the necromancer lord makes a melee weapon attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Vomit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or is {@condition poisoned} until the end of the swine wretch's next turn.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/turn)
entries: The swine slasher deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the swine slasher that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the swine slasher doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Hook
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Butcher Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Ball and Chain
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 15 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, or is {@condition stunned} until the end of the swine chopper's next turn.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Drum of Frenzy
entries: The swine drummer chooses one ally within 60 feet that can hear it. The next attack the ally makes has advantage.

reaction.name: Drum of Debilitation
entries: When a creature that the swine drummer can see within 60 feet of it makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a damage roll, it can use its reaction to subtract the number rolled by {@dice 1d6}. The creature cannot be affected if it can't hear the swine drummer.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the swinetaur moves at least 20 ft. directly towards a target before attacking with its lance, its next lance attack deals an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swinetaur makes two attacks: one with its lance and one with its slam.

action.name: Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) piercing damage. This attack is made with disadvantage if the target is within 5 ft. of the swinetaur.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or the swinetaur choses to either knock the target {@condition prone}, or push it away 5 ft. from the swinetaur.

action.name: Boar Rush {@recharge 5}
entries: The swinetaur must not have moved during its turn before using this action. The swinetaur moves up to its speed in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks. It makes one attack with its lance against each creature it moves past. Then, the swinetaurs remaining movement is 0 until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Spit Roast
entries: Once per turn, when the skiver moves at least 10 ft. straight towards a creature and then hits it with its next ranged javelin attack on the same turn, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or is {@condition stunned} until the end of the skiver's next turn.

trait.name: Throwing Mastery
entries: Thrown weapons deal one extra die of damage when the skiver hits with it and the Skiver has no disadvantage attacks made with a thrown weapon at long range (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skiver makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Javelin (Melee)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Javelin (Thrown)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Crippling Volley {@recharge 5}
entries: The skiver makes a ranged javelin attack against any creatures within 10 ft. of a point within 120 ft. of itself. Each creature hit by a javelin has its movement speed halved and has disadvantage on dexterity saving throws until the end of the skiver's next turn.

reaction.name: Skirmisher
entries: If a creature ends its turn within 5 ft. of the skiver, it moves up to half its movement speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Wilbur
entries: The swine prince is always in company of its little friend Wilbur. If Wilbur dies within the swine prince's sight, or otherwise becomes aware of his death, Enraged Destruction loses its recharge property until the swine prince finishes a short rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swine prince makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Giant Cleaver
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Enraged Destruction {@recharge 5}
entries: The swine prince unleashes wild, rampaging swings. Each creature within a 15- foot cube originating from the swine prince must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 26 ({@damage 4d12}) slashing damage and, if the creature is size medium or smaller, be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Enraged Swing
entries: Whenever Wilbur takes damage by a hostile creature's attack and the swine prince sees him, the swine prince immediately recharges and uses Enraged Destruction.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Wilbur can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: The Swine Princess
entries: Wilbur is always in company of his big friend the swine prince. Additionally Wilbur automatically saves all Dexterity saving throws against the swine prince's effects.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Squeal
entries: Each creature within 5 feet of Wilbur must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) thunder damage.

action.name: End This One
entries: Wilbur uses his flags to signal the swine prince which target to attack. Wilbur can choose one creature within 60 feet of him that he can see. Until the end of Wilbur's next turn, the swine prince's attacks have advantage against that creature. The swine prince must be able to see Wilbur to benefit from this action.

trait.name: The Flesh
entries: This creature is part of 'The Flesh' and has unique abilities that are listed under 'Special Rules: The Flesh'.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Snapping Bite
entries: If a hostile creature within the reach of the flesh (head) attacks an allied creature, the flesh (head) can use a reaction to make a bite attack against the triggering creature.

trait.name: The Flesh
entries: This creature is part of 'The Flesh' and has unique abilities that are listed under 'Special Rules: The Flesh'.

action.name: Spine Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spine Slam
entries: The flesh pounds a target creature within 10 feet of itself with a grotesque spine growth. The creature and any enemy creature within a 5-foot-radius of the target must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save a creature takes half that damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: The Flesh
entries: This creature is part of 'The Flesh' and has unique abilities that are listed under 'Special Rules: The Flesh'.

action.name: Healing Stroke
entries: The flesh regains 18 ({@dice 4d8}) hit points.

trait.name: The Flesh
entries: This creature is part of 'The Flesh' and has unique abilities that are listed under 'Special Rules: The Flesh'.

action.name: Lashing Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) piercing damage. The target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Mucus Vomit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or is {@condition poisoned} until the end of the swine spawn's next turn. A {@condition poisoned} creature's movement speed is reduced by 10 ft.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The swine gorer deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the swine gorer that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the swine gorer doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The swine gorer can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Hook
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Serrated Blade
entries: A creature hit by the swine reaver's butcher blade takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) necrotic damage at the beginning of its next turn. This has no effect on creatures that cannot bleed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swine reaver makes two attacks with its butcher blade.

action.name: Butcher Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Butcher Blade
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 15 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, or is {@condition stunned} until the end of the swine reaver's next turn.

trait.name: Drum of Doom
entries: Each enemy creature that starts its turn within 20 ft. of the swine marcher and can hear its drumming, must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) psychic damage.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Drum of Frenzy
entries: The swine marcher begins playing its drums. Each of its allies within 20 ft. of it that can hear it, adds a {@dice 1d6} to any attack it makes as long as the swime marcher continues performing. The swine marcher must use an action on each of its turns to continue drumming.

reaction.name: Drum of Debilitation
entries: When a creature that the swine marcher can see within 60 feet of it makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a damage roll, it can use its reaction to subtract the number rolled by {@dice 1d8}. The creature cannot be affected if it can't hear the swine marcher.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the swine king fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Wilbur
entries: The swine king is always in company of its little friend Wilbur. If Wilbur dies within the swine king's sight, or otherwise becomes aware of his death, Enraged Destruction loses its recharge property until the swine king finishes a short rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swine king makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Giant Cleaver
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Enraged Destruction {@recharge 5}
entries: The swine prince unleashes wild, rampaging swings. Each creature within a 15- foot cube originating from the swine prince must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 93 ({@damage 6d12}) slashing damage and, if the creature is size medium or smaller, be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Enraged Swing
entries: Whenever Wilbur takes damage by a hostile creature's attack and the swine king sees him, the swine king immediatly recharges and uses Enraged Destruction.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The swine king moves up to half of its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Wilbur's Escape (1/round)
entries: Wilbur moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Giant Cleaver (2 Actions)
entries: The swine king attacks with its cleaver.

trait.name: Evade
entries: If Wilbur is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a dexterity saving throw to only take half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the wilbur fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The wilbur can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: The Swine King
entries: Wilbur is always in company of his big friend the swine king. Additionally Wilbur automatically saves all Dexterity saving throws against the swine king's effects.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Squeal
entries: Each creature within 5 feet of Wilbur must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) thunder damage on a failed save and half as much on a successful one. If the creature fails the saving throw by five or more, it is {@condition stunned} until the end of Wilbur's next turn.

action.name: End This One
entries: Wilbur uses his flags to signal the swine king which target to attack. Wilbur can choose one creature within 60 feet of him that he can see. Until the end of Wilbur's next turn, the swine king's attacks have advantage against that creature. The swine king must be able to see Wilbur to benefit from this action.

action.name: Marking Spores
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) poison damage. The target gets marked with pheromones for one minute. Any plant type creature has advantage on all attacks against the marked creature and is aware of its exact position as long as the creature is within 120 feet of it. A creature can spend an action to remove the spores.

action.name: Rain of Blight
entries: Each creature in a 5-foot-radius centered on a point within 60 feet of the Fungal Artillery must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Cloud of Spores
entries: Each creature within 5 feet of the Fungal Artillery must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage and can't take reactions until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The ectoplasm can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Forming Pains
entries: When an ectoplasm is created by another ectoplasm's Cytokinesis, it cannot use it's Cytokinesis until the end of its next turn. Additionaly an ectoplasm spawned by Cytokinesis cannot use ectoplasm Profusion before it has finished a short or long rest.

action.name: Slime
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/40 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) acid damage.

action.name: Ectoplasmic Profusion
entries: The ectoplasm merges with another ectoplasm within 5 feet to form a large ectoplasm. The large ectoplasm spawns in the same position of the merging. Any creature within 10 feet of the ectoplasm must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure the creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Cytokinesis {@recharge 4}
entries: The ectoplasm multiplies, spawning another ectoplasm within 5 feet of itself. The ectoplasm can only multiply twice per long rest.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The large ectoplasm can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Slime
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) acid damage.

action.name: Flailing
entries: The large ectoplasm flails wildly. Each creature within 5 feet of the large ectoplasm must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save and half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Cytokinesis {@recharge 4}
entries: The large ectoplasm multiplies, spawning an ectoplasm within 5 feet of itself. The large ectoplasm can multiply 3 times per long rest.

trait.name: Fetid Censer
entries: The crone uses a censer as her arcane focus, which amplifies certain spells of hers. Only the crone can use this censer as an arcane focus.
• Poison Spray targets each creature in a 10 by 10 square originating from the crone.
• Darkness causes each creature that ends its turn its radius to have disadvantage on all wisdom saving throws until it leaves the radius.
• Stinking Cloud's radius is increased to 30 ft. and plant creatures automatically succeed on the saving throw.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The crone is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The crone has the following spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Fungus Infested
entries: The giant counts as being both a giant and a plant in terms of creature types and is affected by any game effect that targets either types.

trait.name: Poison Spores
entries: Each strike against the giant releases a puff of toxic spores. The first time in a turn when a creature hits the giant with an attack while within 5 ft. of it must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage on a failed save and half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The unclean giant makes two attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Confusion Spores {@recharge 5}
entries: The unclean giant unleashes a cloud of mind altering spores in a radius of 30 ft. centered on itself. Each non-plant creature in the area must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed safe, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a {@dice d6} to determine what it does during its turn. On a 1 or 2, the creature does noting. On a 3 or 4 the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined action. On a 5 or 6, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

trait.name: Fungus Infested
entries: The virago counts as being both a humanoid and a plant in terms of creature types and is affected by any game effect that targets either types.

trait.name: From Death Comes Life
entries: During its turn, the virago can use a bonus action to have a necrotic fungus sprout from a corpse within 40 ft. of itself. The necrotic fungus is a plant of medium size. It is not a creature and does not act, but it spreads necrotic spores within 20 ft. of itself. A creature cannot regain hit points as long as it is within that area. The necrotic fungus can be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; 20 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hateful virago's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}). The hateful virago can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Putrefying Breath
entries: The hateful virago unleashes noxious spores from its mouth in a 20 ft. cone. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. On a successful save a creature takes half as much damage and is not {@condition poisoned}. A {@condition poisoned} creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage at the beginning of its turn. At the end of its turn it can repeat the saving throw, ending the poison on a success.

trait.name: Twisted Strength
entries: The hag counts as one size larger while grappling.

trait.name: Into the Pot
entries: The hag counts can stuff a creature she has {@condition grappled} that is not larger than medium size into her cauldron as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes three attacks: two of them must be meat tenderizer attacks.

action.name: Meat Tenderizer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Mangle
entries: The hag makes a grapple check against a creature in reach, escape {@dc 14}.

action.name: Season to Perfection
entries: The hag sprinkles a mixture of vile herbs and powders over a creature within 15 feet of her. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the end of the hag's next turn. Creatures that don't need to breathe or are immune to poison automatically succeed on this saving throw.

action.name: Taste The Soup
entries: The hag takes a sip from her Cauldron within 5 feet of her and regenerates 15 ({@dice 3d8 + 2}) hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fungal grabber makes two claw attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, it becomes {@condition grappled}, escape {@dc 13}. While grappling, the fungal grabber can only make claw attacks against the target it has {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage. This attack deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage if the attack is made with advantage.

action.name: Marking Spores
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) poison damage. The target gets marked with pheromones for one minute. Any plant type creature has advantage on all attacks against the marked creature and is aware of its exact position as long as the creature is within 120 feet of it. A creature can spend an action to remove the spores.

action.name: Rain of Blight
entries: Each creature in a 10-foot-radius centered on a point within 60 feet of the fungal battery must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Cloud of Spores
entries: The fungal battery releases a cloud that fills a 15 foot cube centered on itself. Each creature in the cloud other than the fungal battery must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage and can't take reactions until the beginning of its next turn. The area of the cloud is heavily obscured and lasts until the beginning of the fungal battery's next turn.

entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) acid damage.

action.name: Ectoplasmic Profusion
entries: The quivering ectoplasm merges with another quivering ectoplasm within 5 feet to form a towering ectoplasm. The towering ectoplasm spawns in the same position of the merging. Any creature within 10 feet of the ectoplasm must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure the creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Cytokinesis {@recharge 4}
entries: The ectoplasm multiplies, spawning another quivering ectoplasm within 5 feet of itself. The ectoplasm can only multiply twice per long rest.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The towering ectoplasm can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Slime
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Flailling
entries: The towering ectoplasm flails wildly. Each creature within 5 feet of the towering ectoplasm must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save and half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Cytokinesis {@recharge 4}
entries: The large ectoplasm multiplies, spawning a quivering ectoplasm within 5 feet of itself. The towering ectoplasm can multiply 3 times per long rest.

trait.name: Twisted Strength
entries: The hag counts as one size larger while grappling.

trait.name: Into the Pot
entries: The hag counts can stuff a creature she has {@condition grappled} that is not larger than medium size into her cauldron as a bonus action.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the hag fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes three attacks: two of them must be meat tenderizer attacks.

action.name: Meat Tenderizer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d12 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Mangle
entries: The hag makes a grapple check against a creature in reach, escape {@dc 18}.

action.name: Season To Perfection
entries: The hag sprinkles a mixture of vile herbs and powders in 5 ft. radius at a point within 15 feet of her. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for one minute. A {@condition poisoned} creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the poison on a success. Creatures that don't need to breathe or are immune to poison automatically succeed on this saving throw.

action.name: Taste the Soup
entries: The hag takes a sip from her Cauldron within 5 feet of her and regenerates 21 ({@dice 4d8 + 3}) hit points.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The hag moves up to half of her speed.

legendary.name: Grab
entries: The hag makes a grapple check against a creature in reach, escape {@dc 18}.

legendary.name: Into the Pot
entries: The hag stuffs a creature she has {@condition grappled} into her cauldron. To do so, the hag must be within 5 ft. of her cauldron.

legendary.name: Meat Tenderizer (2 Action)
entries: The hag attacks with her meat tenderizer.

trait.name: Maul
entries: The fungal crawler has advantage on attack rolls against creatures it has {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fungal crawler makes two claw attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, it becomes {@condition grappled}, escape {@dc 15}. While grappling, the fungal crawler can only make claw attacks against the target it has {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage. This attack deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) damage if the attack is made with advantage.

action.name: Marking Spores
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) poison damage. The target gets marked with pheromones for one minute. Any plant type creature has advantage on all attacks against the marked creature and is aware of its exact position as long as the creature is within 120 feet of it. A creature can spend an action to remove the spores.

action.name: Rain of Blight
entries: Each creature in a 20-foot-radius centered on a point within 60 feet of the fungal bombard must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Cloud of Spores
entries: The fungal bombard releases a cloud that fills a 10-foot radius centered on itself. Each creature in the cloud other than the fungal bombard must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage and can't take reactions until the beginning of its next turn. The area of the cloud is heavily obscured and lasts until the beginning of the fungal bombard's next turn.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The cohesive ectoplasm can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Forming Pains
entries: When an ectoplasm is created by another ectoplasm's Cytokinesis, it cannot use it's Cytokinesis until the end of its next turn. Additionaly an ectoplasm spawned by Cytokinesis cannot use Ectoplasmic Profusion before it has finished a short or long rest.

action.name: Slime
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/40 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Ectoplasm Profusion
entries: The cohesive ectoplasm merges with another cohesive ectoplasm within 5 feet to form a giant ectoplasm. The giant ectoplasm spawns in the same position of the merging. Any creature within 10 feet of the ectoplasm must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure the creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Flailing
entries: The giant ectoplasm flails wildly. Each creature within 5 feet of the giant ectoplasm must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save and half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Cytokinesis {@recharge 4}
entries: The giant ectoplasm multiplies, spawning a cohesive ectoplasm within 5 feet of itself. The giant ectoplasm can multiply 3 times per long rest.

trait.name: Fetid Censer
entries: The crone uses a censer as her arcane focus, which amplifies certain spells of hers. Only the crone can use this censer as an arcane focus.
• Poison Spray targets each creature in a 10 by 10 square originating from the crone.
• Darkness causes each creature that ends its turn its radius to have disadvantage on all wisdom saving throws until it leaves the radius.
• Stinking Cloud's radius is increased to 30 ft. and plant creatures automatically succeed on the saving throw.
• Cloud Kill's does not harm plant creatures that enter the spell's area.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The crone is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The crone has the following spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Fungus Infested
entries: The giant counts as being both a giant and a plant in terms of creature types and is affected by any game effect that targets either types.

trait.name: Poison Spores
entries: Each strike against the giant releases a puff of toxic spores. The first time in a turn when a creature hits the giant with an attack while within 5 ft. of it must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save and half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blighted giant makes two attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Confusion Spores {@recharge 5}
entries: The blighted giant unleashes a cloud of mind altering spores in a radius of 30 ft. centered on itself. Each non-plant creature in the area must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed safe, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a {@dice d6} to determine what it does during its turn. On a 1 or 2, the creature does noting. On a 3 or 4 the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined action. On a 5 or 6, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

action.name: Season to Perfection
entries: The hag sprinkles a mixture of vile herbs and powders in 10 ft. radius at a point within 15 feet of her. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for one minute. Creatures that fail the saving throw by 5 or more spend their action during their next turn retching and reeling. A {@condition poisoned} creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the poison on a success. Creatures that don't need to breathe or are immune to poison automatically succeed on this saving throw.

entries: The hag stuffs a creature she has {@condition grappled} into her cauldron. To do so, the hag must be within 5 ft. of her cauldron.

legendary.name: Meat Tenderizer (2 Actions)
entries: The hag attacks with her meat tenderizer.

entries: The pelagic can breathe air and water.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Harpoon
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength contest against the pelagic or be pulled 5 feet toward the pelagic.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The pelagic can breathe air and water.

action.name: Cestus
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Guard
entries: The pelagic chooses one ally within 5 feet of itself. Until the beginning of the pelagic's next turn any attack that targets the chosen ally has disadvantage as long as the pelagic is within 5 feet of the chosen ally.

reaction.name: Protect
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the pelagic attacks an ally under the effect of the pelagic's guard, the pelagic attacks the attacking creature with its cestus. To do so, the pelagic must see the attacker and the creature it guards.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The pelagic can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
